ElecCompDef.name: NC
ElecCompDef.desc: NC单元是数控机床的重要组成部件，是操作人员与数控机床进行交互的工具。操作人员可以通过它对数控机床进行操作、编程、调试、对机床参数进行设定和修改，还可以通过它了解、查询数控机床的运行状态，是数控机床特有的一个输入、输出部件。主要有显示装置、NC键盘、机床控制面板、状态灯、手持单元等部分组成。

Comps.ElecCompDef: #第二视角模型 viewMdls=nc_view|105|520|268 #NC按钮配置文件 NCButtons=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/ncButton/NCButtons.xml #数控系统菜单配置文件 NCMonitorMenu=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/NCMonitorMenu.xml #系统参数 allSystemParam=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/FUNAC0iTD_Param.xml #系统参数默认值 SystemParamDefalutValue=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/FUNAC0iTD_Param_default.txt #Offset设定参数 OffsetSet=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/ofsset/OfssetSetParams.xml #辅助功能参数 AssistFunction=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/prmset/Style1SysPrmSetAssistFunction.xml #轴设定 AxisSet=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/prmset/Style1SysPrmsetAxisSet.xml #高精度设定 HighAccuracySet=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/prmset/Style1SysPrmSetHighAccuracySet.xml #伺服参数 ServoParam=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/prmset/Style1SysPrmsetServoParam.xml #伺服设定 ServoSet=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/prmset/Style2SysPrmSetServoSet.xml #主轴设定 SpindleSet=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/prmset/Style2SysPrmSetSpindleSet.xml #伺服设定特殊 UniqueServoSet=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/sys/prmset/UniqueSysPrmServoSet.xml #伺服电机型号 ServoMotorType=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/motor/ServoMotorType.xml #主轴电机型号 SpindleMotorType=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/monitor/motor/SpindleMotorType.xml #PLC参数 PLCParam_Default=com/cas/me/maintenance/config/configurations/ladder/PLCParam_Default.xml
